signs.start_location: In front of chest, index fingers and thumbs touching.
signs.end_location: In front of chest, little fingers touching.
signs.movement: With palms facing forward, twist both hands forward at the wrist, rotating them until the little fingers touch, forming a circle.
signs.contact_point: Starts with index fingers and thumbs touching; ends with little fingers touching.
signs.source_description: Place both 'F' hands together with palms facing front and twist forward, bringing the little fingers together.

signs.movement: The sign is a compound motion. First, touch the middle finger to the forehead (for 'FATHER'), then move the hand down and touch the middle finger to the chin (for 'MOTHER').
signs.contact_point: Middle finger touches forehead, then middle finger touches chin.
signs.source_description: Place the middle finger of the 'P' hand on the middle of the forehead and then on the chin.

signs.contact_point: Thumb of the open hand touches the forehead.
signs.source_description: Touch the forehead with the thumb of your open hand.

signs.contact_point: Thumb of the open hand touches the chin.
signs.source_description: Touch the chin with the thumb of your open hand.

signs.movement: First, touch the thumb to the forehead. Then, move the hand forward in two small, bouncing arcs.
signs.source_description: Touch the forehead with the thumb of your open hand then move the hand in forward arcs.

signs.movement: First, touch the thumb to the chin. Then, move the hand forward in two small, bouncing arcs.
signs.source_description: Touch the chin with the thumb of your open hand then move the hand in forward arcs.

signs.non_dominant_handshape: N/A (The image shows a second hand to indicate height, but the core sign is one-handed)
signs.movement: Start with the 'AND' hand (fingers and thumb together) at the forehead, then pull it straight forward.
signs.source_description: Pull the 'AND' hand forward from the forehead then place your flat hand at your side.

signs.non_dominant_handshape: N/A (The image shows a second hand to indicate height, but the core sign is one-handed)
signs.start_location: Top of cheek, near the ear.
signs.end_location: Front of cheek, near the mouth.
signs.movement: Slide the thumb of the 'A' hand forward along the cheekbone.
signs.contact_point: Side of the thumb slides along the cheek.
signs.source_description: Slide the 'A' hand forward over the cheek then place your flat hand at your side.

signs.end_location: Inner elbow of the non-dominant arm.
signs.movement: A compound sign. First, sign 'BOY' by pulling the 'AND' hand from the forehead. Then, move that same hand down to rest in the crook of the other arm, as if cradling a baby.
signs.contact_point: Fingertips touch forehead, then the signing hand rests on the inner elbow.
signs.source_description: Make the sign for 'BOY' then move the hand to the inner elbow.

signs.end_location: Inner elbow of the non-dominant arm.
signs.movement: A compound sign. First, sign 'GIRL' by sliding the 'A' hand along the cheek. Then, move that same hand down to rest in the crook of the other arm, as if cradling a baby.
signs.contact_point: Thumb slides on cheek, then the signing hand rests on the inner elbow.
signs.source_description: Make the sign for 'GIRL' then move the hand to the inner elbow.

signs.end_location: In front of the body with index fingers together.
signs.movement: A compound sign. First, sign 'BOY'. Then, bring both hands forward with index fingers extended and pointing forward, and bring them together so the sides of the fingers touch.
signs.contact_point: Index fingers touch along their sides.
signs.source_description: Make the sign for 'BOY' then point both index fingers forward and bring them together.

signs.end_location: In front of the body with index fingers together.
signs.movement: A compound sign. First, sign 'GIRL'. Then, bring both hands forward with index fingers extended and pointing forward, and bring them together so the sides of the fingers touch.
signs.contact_point: Index fingers touch along their sides.
signs.source_description: Make the sign for 'GIRL' then point both index fingers forward and bring them together.
